mapper.select: SELECT emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del FROM t_emp_pool WHERE emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}

SELECT emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del FROM t_emp_pool WHERE name = #{name} and phonenumber = #{phonenumber} and del != 'Y'

SELECT emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del FROM t_emp_pool ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_emp_pool SET emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}, sourcing_manager = #{sourcing_manager}, name = #{name}, phonenumber = #{phonenumber}, birthdate = #{birthdate}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, education = #{education}, school_name = #{school_name}, major = #{major}, career_years = #{career_years}, career_field = #{career_field}, career_level = #{career_level}, project_assign = #{project_assign}, del = #{del} WHERE emp_pool_id = #{emp_pool_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_emp_pool ( emp_pool_id, sourcing_manager, name, phonenumber, birthdate, email, address, education, school_name, major, career_years, career_field, career_level, project_assign, del ) VALUES ( DEFAULT, #{sourcing_manager}, #{name}, #{phonenumber}, #{birthdate}, #{email}, #{address}, #{education}, #{school_name}, #{major}, #{career_years}, #{career_field}, #{career_level}, '투입대기', 'N' );
